## Checklist

- [ ] Commits follow the Conventional Commits convention (feat/fix/chore/docs/refactor/test) â€” this is required for automatic releases.
- [ ] Tests added / updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)

## Notes

- Use `feat:` for new features, `fix:` for bug fixes, `chore:` for non-functional changes.
- Examples:
  - `feat(minecraft): add support for players_count`
  - `fix(clock): handle timezone correctly`
